name: ORDER_MED_ALTCSN
description: It contains the unique contact specific alert number for the order.  Link it to alert related tables, such as ALT_HISTORY, ALT_ORDINFO, to get alert related information.

columns.name: ORDER_MED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The contact date that corresponds to the encounter this order alert occurred.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for each alert unique contact number.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: ALT_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the alert across all contacts and alerts in ALT master file.  You could link this to ALT_HISTORY table to get the alert information.
